channel.title: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer
channel.description:
Ok if i go to www.moparisthebest.com this is what happens I press run It comes up as regular but the red bar never appears and the whole background is grey all of a sudden it turns white and the page closes..... This is only with my laptop. With my desktop, it works fine.
-TROUBLES WITH DOWNLOADED CLIENT- I press moparscape.java and it comes up it says starting up but the red bar never goes any further......
-TROUBLES WITH CUSTOM CLIENTS- I open and it works fine but if i take two steps it goes away......any clients
PPLZZZZ HELP cuz my sister is usually on the big boy desktop computer and the server is being hosted on the laptop and so i can't play with my people unless i hvae two computers on which is too much for my electric bill..........so umm yya PPPLLLLZZZZ HElp any help i guess would be greatlyu apprecitated and if i could, i would give reps

item.title: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

i have java .ike 6 update like 14 or someting…and i can run my server and compile it and stuff…but silab client works…only client that works. its not really working for me though…it crashes a bunch…and cleaning my browser cache???
ok when i press delete browserr…it says these options
passwords
cookies
form data
temp internet files
history
which one?

Read full topic
item.source: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer

item.title: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Swinescape:

For some reason Moparscape does not work on Laptops

Yes it does. It works on anything with a java 1.5 or newer VM.

If you had a problem earlier today, I have fixed it. If you still have a problem (after clearing your browser cache) post again.

Read full topic
item.source: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer

item.title: Client help.........Plz look because you probably already know the answer
item.dc:creator: @owned654321241 owned654321241
item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Swine your wrong. I am on a laptop and have been for 3 years and mopar has always worked so idk where you came up with the assumption that it doesn’t work on laptops.
And ant… my suggestion is to make sure that you have the most recent version of java and maybe even go into your task manager and set the client/moparscape web browser to high priority. And if all else fails then i am going to have to assume that it is a POS laptop.

Read full topic
